title: Lady Alimony, or, The alimony lady an excellent, pleasant, new comedy, duly authorized, daily acted and frequently followed.
author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.
publisher: Printed for Tho. Vere and William Gilbertson ...,
notes: Erroneously ascribed to Thomas Lodge and Robert Greene. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
